CreditCardTransaction.title: Credit Card Transaction
CreditCardTransaction.description: Represents a single transaction from a credit card statement.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns this transaction.

transactionDate.description: The date when the transaction occurred.

category.description: The category assigned to the transaction.

DepositAccountTransaction.title: DepositAccountTransaction
DepositAccountTransaction.description: Represents a single transaction from a deposit account statement.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Deposit Account Transaction entity.

transactionDate.description: The date when the transaction occurred.

transactionTime.description: The time when the transaction occurred.

description.description: A description of the transaction, combining summary and ledger note.

amount.description: The amount of the transaction. Positive values indicate withdrawals, negative values indicate deposits.

otherPartyBankCode.description: Bank code of the other party involved in the transaction.

otherPartyAccountNumber.description: Account number of the other party involved in the transaction.

/users/{userId}/credit_card_transactions.description: Stores credit card transaction data for a specific user. Access is restricted to the owner of the user document based on their UID.
